posts.post_content:
--SOLD--$75 for the last six, delivered. If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price. First taker gets it.   

Most forms of payment okay. If paypal, pay as friend; thanks.

I am always looking to upgrade [Good or better], so if you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have. I prefer ungraded cards.

No pm's, please. Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url], or post here.

Fletcher,--RESERVED--
Ford [note two spots of paper-loss on front]--SOLD--
McIntyre, Brooklyn [I'd describe this as scratched on the green]--SOLD--
Wagner, bat on left shoulder [This is the nicest of the bunch],
Adkins [several pushed-in pin-holes on top; name on top and bottom]--SOLD--
Mattern,
Murray,
Cross,
Shipke,
Flanagan,
Oakes,--SOLD--
Bransfield,--SOLD--
Moran--SOLD--
McQuillan, ball in hand--RESERVED--
Berger--SOLD--


*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in opposite order. Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:
